title: Advanced Language Instruction Course Design Through Team Teaching

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level language fundamentals and scholarly research experience
context.additional_context: Language education environments emphasizing learner interaction and interdisciplinary approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can integrate subject-matter-expert-assigned language education content in team-teaching environments with over 90% accuracy.
Learners strengthen collaborative learning competencies by participating over 80% in team-teaching lesson design via online discussion forums.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply advanced language theories delivered via team-teaching with over 85% accuracy in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
